Class ClientServer.ClientServerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • py4j.ClientServer.ClientServerBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    ClientServer
    public static class ClientServer.ClientServerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to make it easier and self-documenting how a ClientServer is constructed.
